name: Sweet Shooter
description:
Where  a 3rd Person shooter meets sweets and desserts.

Play as a delicious shortcake and collect all the hidden candies. Still, be careful of traps  scattered around the map as they will make you fall,resulting in Game Over.Stay away from the rival cupcakes and falling lemons too as they will result in instant Game Over as well.

Controls:move with WASD,jump with SPACE,shoot with right mouse button.To collect the candies simply shoot the presents and collide with the them(if you shot the right present).

It takes few minutes to complete it
